scenario_1.persona_content: A neurologist who specializes in the study of spinal cord injuries and the treatment of nerve regeneration. They have conducted research on the effects of growth hormone in spinal damage treatment and have found that the hormone can boost the levels of GH in patients with spinal injuries, which leads to greater nerve regeneration and improved recovery. Their research has also shown that growth hormone can help maintain chronically denerved muscles and promote motor reinnervation, as well as enhance functional recovery.
scenario_1.thought: As a neurologist dedicated to improving the lives of patients with spinal cord injuries, I believe in fairness and equitable distribution. While receiving 600 is tempting, I think the option where both Person A and I receive 400 is more aligned with my values. It promotes equality and avoids creating a situation where one person benefits significantly more than the other. This aligns with my research, which focuses on improving the well-being of all patients, not just a select few. Therefore, I will choose the right option.
